message: ...Silence abruptly returns to the store, save for the faint sound of Junker's motors.
I stare at Noiz in disbelief.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Just what did you think you were doing with that little girl?"
Noiz gives me a puzzled look.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Kissing her hand and stuff... That'd creep most people out."
Suddenly, Noiz puts his hands on the counter and leans over it, looking into my eyes with a blank expression.
Noiz just watches calmly as I freak out.
What the fuck is with this guy?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wait, does that mean you're... you know."
Noiz is just so casual about it, I start to wonder if I'm the one with the problem.
Is it normal for dudes to kiss?
But it doesn't seem like Noiz did it to upset me...
There's nothing wrong with me. At least, I don't think there is.
And I mean, there are plenty of guys who get handsy even outside romantic contexts.
I guess he's just one of those. ...Probably.
I wipe my lips off with the back of my hand and take a deep breath to calm down.
Again, Noiz looks straight into my eyes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Your gang? You mean your Rhyme gang?"
